title: Enna Nenacha Nee Song Lyrics Chokka Thangam
stanzas:
Enna Nenacha Nee Song Lyrics From Chokka Thangam
#Deva #Unnikrishnan #AnuradhaSriram

Enna nenacha nee
enna nenacha
en nenjukulla unn
vachi thatcha podhu..

Enna nenacha nee
enna nenacha
en nenjukulla unn
vachi thatcha podhu..

sokki thavichen
sokki thavichen
naan sokka thangam
kittiyathaal thulli
kudhichen (2)

kutraala saaral adhu
kannoram oori vara
unna nenachen naan
unna nenachen
endha poorva jenma
punniyamo unna
adanjen.

naan thara sirippam
unnoda vetpam
naan thottu paakkurappa
enna nenacha

theekuchi vandhu
theekuchi kitta
soukiyam kaetkudhunu
naanum nenachen

un kanna kuli
mutham vachen
enna nenacha

en nenjukudi
meethan onnu
kaetka nenachen

en peraasa nooraasa
ketkayil adi thaemalli
nee enna nenachaddi

aareazhu kattilukkum
anjaaru thottilukkum
solla nenachen naan
solla nenachen
unna ottu moththa
kuthagaiyaa alla nenachen.

alla nenachen naan
alla nenachen
unna ottu moththa
kuthagaiyaa alla nenachen.

methaikkumela unnoda
seela enkaiyyil sikkum vela
enna nenacha

eppodhum pola
unnoda vela
arrambam aachuthunnu
naanum nenachen

nee ullkaayatha
paakkurappa enna nenacha
nee nagam vetta venummnu
solla nenachen.

naam onnodu onnaagum
nerathil un poondhegamnu
nenachaya

kalyanathula sorgathula
kacheri neramunu
katti pudichen naan
katti pudichen
en vetkam vittu
moochu mutta katti
pudichen

sokki thavichen
sokki thavichen
naan sorgathaiye
ettiyathaal thulli
kudhichen

kutraala saaral adhu
kannoram oori vara
unna nenachen naan
unna nenachen
endha poorva jenma
punniyamo unna
adanjen.

seo.title: Enna Nenacha Nee Song Lyrics Chokka Thangam
seo.description: Get the complete Enna Nenacha Nee Song Lyrics Chokka Thangam from Chokka Thangam. Read the lyrics penned by Pa Vijay and composed by Deva and sung by Anuradha Sriram. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Pa Vijay, Chokka Thangam, Deva, Anuradha Sriram, Unnikrishnan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
